long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with a daily dose of motivation! Corner Quotes displays a random inspirational quote in the bottom-right corner of your screen every time you open a new tab. Perfect for staying focused, positive, and productive throughout your day.
